description: The Status History table contains a history of each time the transaction's status has changed.

columns.name: TRANSACTION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the detail transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AR_STATUS_CHANGE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant of the status change.

columns.name: AR_SYSTEM_UPDATED_STATUS_YN
columns.description:
Whether the status change occurred automatically by the system (yes or no).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: AR_TX_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status that the transaction was changed to.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


New


Waiting to file


Filing


In Review


Filed


Voided
